pageContext.geocode_address: 50 Black Point Rd, Rumson, NJ 07760, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Level up your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as Motorcycles, Aircraft Carriers, Conveyor Belts, and Rail Racers! Design and build as never before, and explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment. There are no prerequisites for this course.
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM FUNdamentals with LEGO® Materials, Summer 2
pageContext.action_url_comment: For any questions please contact Kevin Delia from the Rumson Recreation center at KDelia@rumsonnj.gov
